DOC.brief_summary: Pollen allergen extracts are prepared locally and checked for efficacy by comparison to imported allergens and specific IgE.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Skin Prick Testing Results of Local and Imported Pollen Allergen Extracts and Specific IgE
DOC.detailed_description: Skin prick test (SPT) and specific IgE (sIgE) are approved for evaluation of allergen sensitization. Local allergen extracts are cheaper and more available but need standardization. Pollen allergen extracts: Bermuda, Johnson and careless weed are locally prepared and compared mean wheal diameter of skin prick test to imported allergens and also to specific IgE.
DOC.criteria: Positive skin prick test to Bermuda or Johnson or careless weed Chronic diseases such as heart disease, liver, renal and severe sepsis Severe allergic symptoms such as anaphylaxis Extensive skin rashes Pregnancy
